text: Thanks a ton, <@U042QF4T36G>! The theme you designed is absolutely amazing, and I'm really grateful for the opportunity to use it. I'm super excited to explore more about it!

Hi! I'm one of the makers of <https://www.fillout.com/integrations/HubSpot|Fillout>, a new type of form builder for HubSpot and other CRMs.

We're big fans of HubSpot Forms for simple forms. We built Fillout for the advanced cases like pre-filling forms to update records, multi-step forms and conditional logic.

Feel free to comment with any questions or feedback, Iâ€™ll be around :slightly_smiling_face:
